title: We should be able to report players that troll in champ select and force us to dodge.
body: Honestly, this happens everytime, you get that troll that makes you either waste 20 min in a game you won't win, or forces you to dodge. It sucks that you can't report a player when you have to dodge because he trolls.

replies.body: I've never dodged (in 800 normals and 1200 arams) a game because of a champion or role that someone else picked. If you get a troll in champ select then pick a troll champ yourself. Oh someone wants to go Heim ADC? Well go roaming AD Galio support. Sure you'll lose, but its just a game. You dodging, or letting the trolling bother you is "feeding the trolls." We don't' do that shit around here.

It's a really different situation playing normals/arams, than playing ranks. People care about climbing the ladder and believe it or not dodging a game because of a troll hurts, trolling yourself won't get you anywhere, you're still loosing 20 min in a game you don't even want to play

I understand the difference in the queues, what i don't understand is why someone would assume they are going to lose a game before it begins just because of a "troll pick." OR even that there are such things as troll picks. I should of put it in quotes when i was talking about it in my post above, but i'd be completely fine with someone trying to go roaming AD Galio support. The meta changes because people try out new things. The chances of you getting a shitty team mate are the same as the other team's. 

If someone is just being rude, saying they are going to feed, or anything like that...well you should still play the game. They are staying that so you will dodge. 


That being said, you should be able to report people for trying to pull "mid or feed" type things. If i have pick order and someone tries to mid after we've estabilished that i have pick order...i'm going mid and we can duo mid idgaf.

I wouldn't mind an unusual pick such as twisted fate jungle or what not, but when you have a jungle already and there's this kid that also wants to jungle but can't have it and instalocks urgot with smite and revive, that's pretty troll and your chances for winning that game are almost 0, don't get me wrong i don't care about unusual picks but when someone locks in a lane that's already been locked in that's what gets me.

> [{quoted}](name=Huevo con Jamon,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=yi9tlF5a,comment-id=0005000000000000,timestamp=2015-02-01T07:34:50.866+0000)
>
> I wouldn't mind an unusual pick such as twisted fate jungle or what not, but when you have a jungle already and there's this kid that also wants to jungle but can't have it and instalocks urgot with smite and revive, that's pretty troll and your chances for winning that game are almost 0, don't get me wrong i don't care about unusual picks but when someone locks in a lane that's already been locked in that's what gets me.

There's no rule that there can only be one jungler, and there's no reason to report someone for not sticking to the metagame. As long as they're legitimately trying to win the match and just not trying to grief you, there isn't any reason to get upset.

> [{quoted}](name=JedenVojak,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=yi9tlF5a,comment-id=00050000000000000000,timestamp=2015-02-01T11:24:54.762+0000)
>
> There's no rule that there can only be one jungler, and there's no reason to report someone for not sticking to the metagame. As long as they're legitimately trying to win the match and just not trying to grief you, there isn't any reason to get upset.

When someone locks in JG and say "I'm going to feed", it's obvious he's a troll.

Don't try to be smart, because you don't understand OP's point. It's about intentionally bad behavior.

THAT'S WHERE I WANTED TO GET.

What can you do, not about "troll picks" but about troll picks with a 40 lines long TROLL DECLARATION?

I wanna do something so badly... But I cannot submit this anywhere, can I? I didn't dodge but someone else did, and he's clearly not the one who should get punished...

> [{quoted}](name=DarJul,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=yi9tlF5a,comment-id=0005000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-05-14T21:41:55.779+0000)
>
> THAT'S WHERE I WANTED TO GET.
> 
> What can you do, not about "troll picks" but about troll picks with a 40 lines long TROLL DECLARATION?
> 
> I wanna do something so badly... But I cannot submit this anywhere, can I? I didn't dodge but someone else did, and he's clearly not the one who should get punished...

ya but don't show names on forums, because riot doesn't like it.

> [{quoted}](name=Killer X 12,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=yi9tlF5a,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-02-01T06:29:12.878+0000)
>
> I've never dodged (in 800 normals and 1200 arams) a game because of a champion or role that someone else picked. If you get a troll in champ select then pick a troll champ yourself. Oh someone wants to go Heim ADC? Well go roaming AD Galio support. Sure you'll lose, but its just a game. You dodging, or letting the trolling bother you is "feeding the trolls." We don't' do that shit around here.

Its about ranked nobody cares about norms, especially aram.
Except ranked is the only time you'll have a meaningful penalty for dodging.
You can.  Open a ticket here: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new

I don't think it's really efficient to open a ticket to report someone that trolled in champ select, you probly need to take a screenshot and post in the ticket, which probably won't get the player banned for doing it one time, and if he does it again it's hard to say if another player will open a ticket to report him, we really need an option to report this kind of trolls, something fast and efficient

Yes, I agree it's an awkward solution at best.  You don't need to screenshot; the chat is logged.

Hopefully when Tribunal comes back they'll have some sort of better way to handle this.

100% agree. There is no system in place. Worse if you do stomach the bs champ select just to ff20 there is no "Trolling" option. Which is the number one reason I report.

 Oh a kid lost 20lp for four people? No big. Same kid called one teammate "bad" chat restriction. -Riot 2014-ongoing.

I also think that someone in their promos should get 1 or 2 free dodges with no penalty other than having to wait (that way you at least get matched with new people for sure).  and imo, they should add the option to kick a player from champ select in ranked if you have the majority vote.
Not much more needed.
Why do you only play one champ...?
Doesn't justify the trolling.

I don't even think of a thing like that as a troll... it would be considered more a joke. No matter who or what you do, if you have an issue with having to play more than one champion get off the game. Honestly, one trick ponies shouldn't be able to climb any sort of ladder.
agreed. I get penalized all the time for not being willing to subject myself to a match where they want to 5 man mid or break the meta in a way that is just play asking for a concussion

Just because something isn't meta doesn't make it report worthy, and there should never be a system in the game which reinforces such thinking. It's unhealthy for the game as a whole. If the person is actually playing the game and trying to help the team win then get the hell over it if they aren't a meta pick and doing well. Which actually brings up a good point. I don't understand why people seem to think that the first time they see something out of the meta, they assume that it must have a 100% win rate, or else it's complete shit. It's not like playing {{champion:61}} mid guarantees a 100% win rate, so why the fuck do people get more angry when i'm 1/2/0 AP {{champion:110}} mid, but not as much when i'm 0/2/0 {{champion:61}} ? Like just because they don't normally see it means that it's required to be 10 times more powerful than the norm or else it's not worth doing. What if it's  equally strong, but people just don't play it because it's not popular? 

I'm so sick of people acting like there is a "right" and "wrong" way to play this game. If people would stop thinking that way, then the game might not be turning into shit. It's the same thing that happened in wow, everyone gets angry at people for playing the "wrong" way so the devs start to support the "right" way, and the game becomes bland and boring. The the game reaches a tipping point where every small unfavorable change the game cause a very large number of players to stop playing, and abandon the game. 

I'm actually impressed that more people didn't stop playing with the massive jungle changes which from what i've seen the majority of the community dislike.

If they were to ever implement something like this then i'd better be the exact same as reporting an unskilled player, because frankly someone who doesn't play the meta is no more fault than someone who genuinely bad at the game.

The OP isn't talking about playing unorthodox champions.  Example, if I let my teammates know that I am trying out something like Jungle Leona, I am not considered "trolling" as I can justify my choice.

What the OP is talking about is someone who purposely ruins the flow of the match even before the players get on the field.  He is talking about immature players who, typically in last pick, will force someone out of their locked-in role on top of explicitly saying "I don't give a f*** Mid or feed".  An example of that would be something like Player2 already locking in Jungle Nocturne while the last-pick locks in Shaco and forces Noct out of the Jungle.
i don't think he necessarily means the person is playing a non meta champ.

-CHAT LOG COPY AND PASTED-

--NON OFFENDING PLAYERS NAMES WERE REMOVED--

ME TOP : *selected Malzahar at pre-pick during draft*

JUNG: can i mid?
MID : nah sorry man
SUPPORT Swago Dinero : can I malz?

*SWAGO bans my pre-pick of malzahar at the last second*

JUNG: wtf?
ME TOP: are you kidding me ?
JUNG: reported
MID : troll support
SUPPORT Swago Dinero : If I cant have malz no one can
MID : reported
SUPPORT Swago Dinero : but I love him
MID : yeah and you're support
ME TOP: that was a pretty horrid thing to do. you're thoroughly irritating
MID : ^^
SUPPORT Swago Dinero : alright, captain adverb
SUPPORT Swago Dinero : why don't you throughly suck my balls

-END CHAT LOG- 

This player shows unsportsmanlike conduct, sexually harassing team-mates, intentionally banning team-mate's pre-picks, generally being completely disrespectful to everyone immediately. Does not follow the summoner's code, and is the type of person who really ruins matches for all others involved. 

wastes everyone's time and makes the game a lot less enjoyable.
Not gonna happen. Riot loves trolls. Cause they pay moniiiieees!
True that most troll have expensive skin....
According to rito, trolls don't exist. You are just being a toxic piece of poop.

I don't see how reporting in champ select is going to be any different than reporting them after the game. Oh, and if it has anything to do with pre-game chat I got some bad news for you, but there is no tribunal anymore and not even in-game chat is looked at (except occasionally by Riot in permaban cases). And even if chat still mattered, trolls in champ select would just troll pick and not talk. Then what? Will you run to the forum to demand Riot start banning non-meta picks?

Because then you can dodge and know that the guy copped a champ select report and so if he gets a bunch he gets something like a ranked ban for a few days. The whole idea is that currently there is no punishment for me if I were to cry like a bitch and lock in teemo with revive clarity because i didn't get the role I wanted and that is what the OP is suggesting.

We should be able to report players right in champion select at least in the ranked game mode. This would be an additional report that would compound the standard one after the game. 

We should also be able to vote kick players on champ select. Probably 3 players consenting to kick one other should be enough. This should probably not incur any kind of penalty on that player, but a system should be in place to ensure he will not get queued up with you again in, like, 10 minutes. 

However, if a high-level player (let's make a discount for actual new players

I agree with you 100%. I just had to dodge a ranked game because someone got upset that they weren't getting mid. So they proceeded to tell that team terrible things. All of us said that we would report them after the game. Which only intensified the rage of the midorfeedian. I was hoping they would dodge the game, but they didn't so I decided that losing a few lp would be better than playing with this person. I am in bronze 5 so the loss of LP didn't bother me. I can't go any lower. hahaha. The only thing that sucks is that I had to wait 28 minutes before I could start another game. I know this is first world league problems, but it is a bummer and I do wish that there were a better way to avoid the trolls. I would rather dodge a game and not play for 28 min then deal with some troll. Sooooo......maybe if there was an option to dodge penalty free that would be better. I know it would get abused though. What if it were like rerolls in ARAM though? You only get 2 chances to dodge penalty  free then if you dodge after that you get the 28 min halt.
They are working on that. Once they get lobby and post game stats chats on Tribunal up then this will be resolved (hopefully).

> [{quoted}](name=Jefftiffy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=yi9tlF5a,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-02-01T06:22:20.441+0000)
>
> They are working on that. Once they get lobby and post game stats chats on Tribunal up then this will be resolved (hopefully).

Here we are, still no solution...

My major issue is say a Soraka playing as our adc no I'm not even fucking kidding you I get this kind of shit all the time I should be able to dodge and report this player for doing this shit. His excuse it's normals it doesn't matter! Like I give a fuck I'm rusty trying to clean out the cob webs before my next match, please don't do this. Because then I'm forced to play a match for 20 minutes before my team finally might realize that yeah bad pick! Or possibly have to wait longer because my team thinks it's funny! It's like fuck me this is bullshit give us 1 free dodge a day riot, and let us report somebody during champion select, please! There needs to be some kind of penalty for trolls their needs to be a penalty for it. If it gets abused than yeah you have the power to ignore it or not do anything about it! You know how often I see right now people say report me I don't give a fuck, your current system is not working. One of the downsides of this game being free to play is you have these type of assholes that just want to ruin somebody's day on purpose! And they're casual gamers, there are people out there that purposefully abuse certain things in games and try to break it because that's what's fun to them!

i can agree with this i just was in champ select with some guy named dark royce and i had bot lane and he just said im going adc you are going to support me (i was draven) and not too long ago i played with a troll shyvana jg that didnt take smite said no ganks and said hed run it down mid if we didnt leash him krugs red and raptors... i was in my promos at the time and no one dodged so i lossed my promos.
i have the chat copied down if you guys need proof just give us an option so this doesnt happen to anyone else or so we can decrease the chances of anyone else getting trolls

Yes this just look what a mess this is:

D : URSUPERMAN
D : P{ELASE
D : LETS WSWAP
D : IM DUOP
D : PLESAE <33
K : who are you duo with?
D : Jhinx
D: jinx ****.
D : ursuperman
D: pelase answer
D : me and support are duop
D : can you pelase top:
D : alright **** you
D : fucken ********
D : watch us lose
D : with your fucken
D : ********
D : of a atttitude

He ban my Jinx, continue to feed top lane and blame me for not giving him bot.

I summit  a ticket and nothing seem to happen as of now.
Note : no one was duo with him because the support was with me

Bit of an older thread but I agree 100%. Too many times in normals I had called a role first and locked in a champ then turns out everyone wanted say jg, and they locked in so I dodge so I don't have to have 3 other jg on the team. This happens mostly for mid and jg. We need to be able to report auto lockers and trolls BEFORE the game starts. Not fair when someone takes one for the team and ends up not getting to play a game for an hour because they did the right thing to avoid flamers and trolls. I can understand people trying champs in different places to see how they work. But its a whole another thing when you have everyone on the team wanting one role/flamers cursing someone out for choosing something new and original. Recently I had a lee sin support and he did great.

Yeah, it'd be nice to have a place to report these types of people. Sure Riot has been trying to get the trolls in game but they are forgetting the ones before it even begins. Some people feel as though if they do not get the role they want, they can just troll pick something stupid and let someone else dodge. These people are just as bad as those who troll in game in my opinion. To make things worse, these people may act like the nicest of people in game when they get what they want, so they won't ever get banned.

I was pretty happy to win 3 games in a row and get to 61 lp in G1. Had to dodge 3 games in a row because of similar instances. I was lucky enough to play ranked for the first time in 2-3 months because of bad internet, I do not know when I will get this stable internet to try to climb again.... The first step in fixing a problem is realizing that there is one, people in Riot probably won't see this post but maybe someone will read it and can spread the message.

I do like the idea of this thread but unfortunately people do not understand the difference between trying new things and straight up trolling. I also think that this should only be implemented in Ranked because most people mess around and have fun in normals anyway. I would suggest you implement a report icon during champ select just as you do after game. If someone gets an unusual amount of votes, they can get banned. All of these should be reviewed before any banning, maybe like how we had people review tribunal cases? For this to happen, Riot must save the chat and picks and bans of that champ select just as they do for in game reports. This is where the problem arises which hopefully isn't really a problem for programming. When trolled, more times than not, people tend to dodge which makes it so that game never existed in the first place. Hopefully we can get this resolved and make League a better place to play.
---------------------
Be careful not to post names on forum, it's pubishable and not allowed, even if you're right. They warned me of it once.

What he's talking about, It's not trolling, it's griefing. I've spent a long time thinking about just this. I see a lot of people just promising they will do their worst to ruin your game. And, very often they do. Or, they cause someone else to be penalized for dodging.

There should be a champ select screen report option and the chat should be logged. Specially cause you cannot report someone after the game when someone dodges as a result.
I wish I got 3 LP every time someone dodges a ranked game.
I agree so much, sometimes I dodge trolls so much that I have to wait 15 mins.

20 min games? No way, there's always one other person including the troll that believe you have a chance at beating the hyper fed enemy team. I'd say 30 minute bleed out more like. Meanwhile you just sit there... safely farming because you don't want to be reported for afk.

Yeah... last time I played in the evening I ended up with a 30 minute waiting period because I kept getting people who were high out of their minds and picked champs they had no idea how to play. Better yet, we should get a free one once in a while, because there are a lot of games you're just better off leaving than enduring 20 minutes of trolling and losing 15 lp.
I was just about to make this thread, and I saw it on the front page!
Isn't dodging punished by Leavebot now? Isn't that worse then losing a little bit? Even if it was ranked I wouldn't risk a ban. That's counter-intuitive.
I don't think it is, at least not if you dodge every once in a while, i've dodged and never been place on low priority queue by the leaver buster.

sux even more when your in promos and if you dodge you get a loss...while someones screaming about "you took my lane? time to feed" and locks in tele revive

went thru 7 promos becuz of people like that (honestly only happened in 3 of the promos but still)

why is it promos are such toxic chat and steamroll skillwise in game? everytime i get to one its either a landslide for my team or the other..makes u question it when other games nonpromo's seem to be pretty equal minus the trolls/people who just wont listen to reason (free trinket ward? nah imma just splitpush in the same spot i got caught out like 6x)
Never feed your trolls after midnight. And don't forget to have your trolls spayed or neutered. Tis just a game. If you want to make it to the top you need to have a team of reliable people...
